comments:
Description:
DataException when preview attached report created in 2.0.

Build number:2.1.2.v20061215 and 2.2.0.v20061213

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open attached report in bug #137626 and preview

Expected result:
No errors.

Actual result:
DataException.

Error log:

- Invalid field name: CUSTOMERNUMBER

It is model's bug. One nested table with data set binding to Orders data set
has a column binding to dataSetRow["CUSTOMERNUMBER"], which is not an output
column of Orders data set.

The report design attached in bug #137626 itself is not a valid report design. It uses "row" in nested query to refer to the data set columns of the parent query, and this never accepted by DtE in history.Before the column binding is introduced, we use rows[N]["ColumnName"] to refer to columns in parent query.
We tried the report file in 2.0 release, data exception is thrown out also. So the design file is incorrect. Cancel this bug.
